verbose_text: In addition, very little is known about signal 3 (cytokine milieu) at the time of Ag presentation in this model, but given the reduced priming and Teff memory formation using LV.142T, it is likely that altered levels of IL-7, IL-15, and TGF-beta in the liver micro-environment play a role in reducing the Teff response.
evidence: levels of IL-7, IL-15, and TGF-beta
